actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Yea-Nay Vote: 386 - 22 (Record Vote No: 71).

official_title: A resolution relating to the Privilege of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives not to produce any investigative records sought by a subpoena in relation to an investigation on abuses in the sale of medicare supplemental insurance to the elderly during 1978. Directs the counsel to the Clerk to assert and defend the rights and privileges of the House in the case.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the Privilege of the House of Representatives.
